sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词都含有"资料，信息"之意。
means: information和data作"资料"解时，前者仅指所获得、提供或描述的慨况，而不指具体的数据或资料，后者则指具体的资料。
data是datum的复数形式，本义指作为计算和测量基础的资料。
message ： 指通过书写、谈话和信号等方式所进行的通讯"信息"。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均可表示"新闻，消息，情报"之意。
means: news ： 普通用词，指主要通过报纸、广播和电视等报道的事件，强调消息的新闻性。
information ： 普通用词，泛指消息、情报。
intelligence ： 特指政治、经济、文化或军事等方面的秘密情报或消息。

word_mean: 以适合于通信、存储或处理的形式来表示的知识或消息。

sentence.Network_en: The room was quiet; no one volunteered any further information.
sentence.Network_cn: 房间很安静，无人主动提供更多的信息。

sentence.Network_en: As mentioned earlier, the University supplements this information with an interview.
sentence.Network_cn: 如前所述，大学将通过面试对这一信息进行补充。

sentence.Network_en: If you'd like more information, ring the Hotline on 414 3929.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果想了解更多信息，请拨打热线电话4143929。

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...人员在上岗前均应接受卫生知识、意识培训和相应的岗位培训，确保各岗位人员具有相应的文化素质和操作技能。, 2.信息(information), 企业的信息管理有专门的企业信息管理软件，记录企业的基本信息、设备原材料的购买、产品的生产销售等等信息.
资讯（information）（Information）：国外相关期刊报道的最新成果，国内外重要会议的纪要，书评、书讯等。 头部质子密度成像，T1、T2像磁共 …
经科宏达生物 ... 品牌 Brand 资料 Information 经科宏达 JKHD.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... inform v 通知，告知 information n 信息，情报 informative a 见多识广的.

list.abs: 通字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 通则〖 generalrule〗 通知〖 notify;inform;givenotice〗 通知〖 notice;circular;notification〗.
新视野大学英语1-4册单词 - 豆丁网 ... exchange n. 交换,汇兑,交易所; inform v. 告诉,通知; sympathy n. 同情 286.
英语常见词根前缀后缀大全 ... injustice 不公正 informal 非正式的 in- == 内、入.
而非正式(informal)学习则指在非刻意安排而自然衍生的学习状况(Marschalk, 1988)，包括儿童在日常生活活动中，例如看电视、游戏 …
cultural issues and challenges of the informed consent in older adults ., 老人知情同意的文化议题和挑战.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (also in the sense 'formation of the mind, teaching'), via Old French from Latin informatio(n-), from the verb informare (see inform)

encyclopedia.content: 英语单词基本意义 Information n. 信息 [不可数名词。] [ ˌinfə'meiʃən ] 计算机系统的主要功能是将未经过处理的数据（data）输入至计算机之硬设备，经由软件的运算处理而输出结 果，此一结果即谓之信息（Information），数据可能是原始的数字、文字或符号等，而信息的内容则可能是 计算后的数字、统计后的图表、排序搜寻后的文字等。 例句与用法 久石让的专辑名 1982年，久石让在毕业的同时

entry.def: Information about someone or something consists of facts about them.

example.ex: Pat refused to give her any information about Sarah...
example.tran: 帕特拒绝向她提供任何关于萨拉的消息。

example.ex: Each centre would provide information on technology and training...
example.tran: 每个中心都会提供技术与培训方面的信息。

entry.tran: (计算机程序储存和使用的)数据,资料
entry.def: Information consists of the facts and figures that are stored and used by a computer program.

example.ex: Pictures are scanned into a form of digital information that computers can recognize.
example.tran: 照片被扫描成某种电脑可以识别的数字资料。

entry.def: Information is a service which you can telephone to find out someone's telephone number.

means.word_mean: 2. a collection of facts from which conclusions may be drawn;
3. knowledge acquired through study or experience or instruction
4. (communication theory) a numerical measure of the uncertainty of an outcome;

sentences.sentence: "the signal contained thousands of bits of information"

auth_sentence.res_content: For more information please visit our page about complaints.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For more information please visit our page about complaints.

auth_sentence.content: I've been the Information Commissioner for two years.
auth_sentence.res_content: I've been the Information Commissioner for two years.

Sentence.sentence: The household survey can be faulty in that some people won't provide truthful information.
some people won't provide truthful information

The University of Maryland at College Park is proceeding cautiously, giving the iPhone or iPod Touch to 150 students, said Jeffrey Huskamp, vice president and chief information officer at the university.

means.word_mean: 消息; 资料; 情报

sentences.en: A computer is a device for handling of processing information.
sentences.cn: 计算机是信息处理设备。

sentences.en: I'm perfectly able to look after myself, for your information.
sentences.cn: 我完全能够照顾自己, 特此奉告。

jushi.english: He gave every piece of information a sum-up.
jushi.chinese: 他对每条消息都作了摘要。

jushi.english: For your information, the library is on the first floor.
I'm inquiring after any information the library might have on future city planning.
jushi.chinese: 我正在搜索图书馆可能有的关于城市未来规划的资料。
